content: कौटिल्यं {@--1@} Crookedness(<ab>lit.</ab> and <ab>fig.</ab>). {@--2@} Wickedness {@--3@} Dishonesty, fraud; <ls>Pt. 2. 185.</ls> --ल्यः ‘The crooked’, <ab>N.</ab> of Cāṇakya. a celebrated writer on civil polity, (the work being known as चाणक्यनीति), the friend and adviser of Candragupta and a very important character in the Mudrārākṣasa; कौटिल्यः कुटिलमतिः स एष येन क्रोधाग्नौ प्रसभमदाहि नंदवंशः <ls>Mu. 1. 7</ls>; स्पृशति मां भृत्यभावेन कौटिल्यशिष्यः <ls>Mu. 7.</ls>
